We are a team of more than 40 specialists; Business Consultants, Strategists, Technologists, User Experience Wizards, User Interface Designers, Developers and Testers.

We all have one goal; to build the best apps and responsive websites out there. Nothing makes us sadder than downloading an app or accessing mobile content that does not live up to expectation.

Our team is small, but our ideas are big and we really have what it takes to make them happen.

Join us

Facts

Launched in Shanghai, China on 2009.09.09

  1. Four Offices; Shanghai, Changsha, Singapore, Hangzhou
  2. International team of 40
  3. More than 60 apps launched to date across all major platforms
  4. Clients include: The Coca Cola Company, Unilever, Ford, KFC, Standard Chartered Bank, Sephora, Michael Kors, Lane Crawford, Redbull, Bosch, SingTel, Zespri, Adeo, Lee Jeans, BAT, Lonely Planet, Greenpeace, Tourism Victoria and Xinhua
  5. Accumulated 80 years of continuous game play across KFC EXO, King of Frogs, Super Ball Escape, Kiwi Farm, Speedracer:The Beginning and Domo: The Journey
  6. Over 7,000,000 app downloads
  7. Most downloaded app: DatouDatou with over 2,000,000 downloads to date. #2 App overall in China and #1 Photo & Video app across Greater China
